title: Shipping
description: Shipping information for one or more products, such as method, cost, etc.

xdm:shippingMethod.title: Shipping Method
xdm:shippingMethod.description: The method of shipping chosen by the customer, such as standard delivery, expedited delivery, pick up in store, etc.

xdm:shippingAmount.title: Shipping Amount
xdm:shippingAmount.description: The amount the customer had to pay for shipping.

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency code
xdm:currencyCode.description: The ISO 4217 alphabetic currency code used for pricing the product.

xdm:shippingDestination.title: Shipping Destination
xdm:shippingDestination.description: The ship-to  destination specified by the user. It could be home, store etc.

xdm:shipDate.title: Ship Date
xdm:shipDate.description: The date when one or more items from an order is shipped.

xdm:trackingNumber.title: Tracking Number
xdm:trackingNumber.description: The tracking number provided by the shipping carrier for a order item shipment.

xdm:trackingURL.title: Tracking URL
xdm:trackingURL.description: The URL to track the shipping status of an order item.
